Shunt-TLM SystemC API (namespace shunt_tlm)
Types
shunt_tlm_command
SHUNT_TLM_END_SIM

end of Client simulation, send by Server

SHUNT_TLM_START_SIM

start of simulation,send by Target

enum shunt_tlm_command {SHUNT_TLM_END_SIM = tlm_command::TLM_IGNORE_COMMAND+1,SHUNT_TLM_START_SIM};
